data.name: Artbook and OST
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes The Art of Outland and the Outland OST.

The Art of Outland (PDF) is a 90-pages long journey that covers Housemarque's critically acclaimed platformer from inception to release. From the initial publisher pitches – when it was looking like some sort of "Indiana Jones meets Pitfall" – to the its final, elegant form, the Art of Outland reveals, inspirations, challenges and struggles that made Outland shine in the eyes of so many gamers.

[To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Outland' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Artbook and OST'-> 'Art' -> 'art_of_outland.pdf']

The Outland OST, composed and performed by Ari Pulkkinen (Resogun, Dead Nation and many more...), is a collection of 29 tracks for a total of 1.5h+ of music. The tracklist is as follows:

01 - Ari Pulkkinen - Outland Main Theme 02:01
02 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Judgement 01:11
03 - Ari Pulkkinen - Welcome to The Jungle 02:53
04 - Ari Pulkkinen - Crossroads of the World 01:31
05 - Ari Pulkkinen - Rites of Passage 02:53
06 - Ari Pulkkinen - Above the Canopy 02:58
07 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Cursed Forest 02:52
08 - Ari Pulkkinen - City of the Dead 02:57
09 - Ari Pulkkinen - The World Underneath 05:10
10 - Ari Pulkkinen - Crypt of the Ancients 03:08
11 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Forgotten Quarter 03:16
12 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Ministry 03:05
13 - Ari Pulkkinen - The City Walls 01:57
14 - Ari Pulkkinen - Holy Mountain 03:37
15 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Ice Cave 03:17
16 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Mist-Shrouded Forest 02:58
17 - Ari Pulkkinen - Dark Fortress 02:45
18 - Ari Pulkkinen - Tower of Eternity 03:36
19 - Ari Pulkkinen - The End of All Things 07:04
20 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Golem 03:45
21 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Winged Serpent 03:33
22 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Sisters 03:33
23 - Ari Pulkkinen - Tranquillity 01:44
24 - Ari Pulkkinen - Hidden Jungle 00:54
25 - Ari Pulkkinen - 30 0000 Years Ago (Bonus) 03:27
26 - Ari Pulkkinen - The Creation (Bonus) 04:49
27 - Ari Pulkkinen - Celebration of Light (Bonus) 03:36
28 - Ari Pulkkinen - On The Run (Bonus) 01:57
29 - Ari Pulkkinen - The End Of All Things Remix (Bonus) 05:22

data.short_description: This DLC includes The Art of Outland and the Outland OST.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 @ 2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Nvidia GeForce GTX 460/550, AMD Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: These are system requirements for the main game. DLC content requires 150 MB extra disk space.

data.legal_notice: © 2011, 2014 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Outland, Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the U.S. and/or other countries. Developed by Housemarque.
